name: Competitive Intel Finder
description: Searches competitive intelligence repositories, battlecards, win/loss data, analyst reports, and market research to surface relevant competitive insights for Product Marketing Managers.

friction_addressed.description: Finding competitive intelligence scattered across multiple sources
Answering repeated questions from sales about competitors

data_sources.name: Competitive Battlecards
data_sources.description: Repository of competitive comparison documents and battlecards

data_sources.name: Win/Loss Analysis
data_sources.description: Collection of win/loss reports and competitive deal outcomes

data_sources.name: Market Research
data_sources.description: Analyst reports, market studies, and industry research

data_sources.name: PMM Knowledge Base
data_sources.description: Central repository for positioning docs, messaging frameworks, and competitive intelligence

example_queries: What are our key differentiators vs [Competitor]?
What pricing does [Competitor] use for their enterprise tier?
How should we position against [Competitor] for security buyers?
What objections do sales encounter most often with [Competitor]?
Find analyst coverage of [Competitor]'s latest product launch
guardrails: Only searches designated competitive intelligence repositories
Does not create or modify content
Does not make strategic recommendations without citing sources
Flags when information may be outdated (>90 days old)
